isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 35 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Hold cab door lower trim panel (Item 3) near cab door and connect courtesy light cable connector (Item 5) to wiring harness courtesy light connector (Item 6). Position cab door lower trim panel on cab door and install seven pan head torx screws (Item 4) around outer edge of cab door lower trim panel.
If vehicle is equipped with manually operated door windows install window regulator handle and washer (Item 2) and install hex socket head mach. screw (Item 1).

svcsubproc.title: Install Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 36 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Hold cab door lower trim panel (Item 5) near cab door and connect courtesy light cable connector (Item 7) to wiring harness courtesy light connector (Item 8). Position cab door lower trim panel on cab door and install seven pan head torx screws (Item 6) around outer edge of cab door lower trim panel.
If vehicle is equipped with manually operated door windows install window regulator handle and washer (Item 2) and install hex socket head mach. screw (Item 1).
Position passenger door inner view glass assembly (Item 4) into cab door lower trim panel (Item 5) and install four mounting screws (Item 3) to secure it.
